content:
The Brewery can be used to make §aLubricant§r from §aRedstone§r and §aCreosote§r/§aOil§r.

Lubricant has its uses here and there, but is mostly for the §3Cutting Machine§r. That significantly reduces duration of recipes.


§
§9Note:§r The Brewery enables the Biomass path towards §9Ethylene§r. The same can be done in the §3Pyrolyse Oven§r. The other path invovles Oil.§r


§bLore:§r §oYou can make a Brewery if you want to build up a company and start selling Booze... Oh wait nevermind, that's GregTech 6.§r
